seller_description: The OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2 delivers an exceptional audio experience with up to 30 hours of non-stop music on a single charge, and a quick 10-minute charge provides up to 20 hours of immersive playback. Equipped with a large 12.4 mm bass driver and a titanium-coated dome, it offers deep, powerful bass and rich audio detail across all frequencies. Anti-distortion audio technology ensures smooth, clear sound, while larger sound cavities and advanced algorithms keep the audio distortion-free. These wireless earbuds are water and sweat-resistant, with an IP55 rating, making them all-weather ready. Model E305a includes call control functionality and offers a long-lasting battery life of 30 hours.
review: The earbuds don't come in the color I wanted. I was hoping for a bright red version, but only black and blue were available.
Expected-output: The buyer’s review focuses on the lack of a specific color option, which is unrelated to the seller’s description or promises. The seller has not claimed availability in bright red or other specific colors beyond what is shown in the images. The product delivered matches the description and images, and the dissatisfaction stems from the buyer's personal preference, not the seller’s fault.
label: -1 buyers opinion
